text:
Pursuant to California Family Code Section 17304, there is hereby established a Department Child Support Services that is separate and independent from any other City or County department. The Director of the Department of Child Support Services shall be appointed consistent with State law and in accordance with the qualifications established by the State Department of Child Support Services in accordance with California Family Code Section 17304. The department shall include such officers and employees that are members of the Family Support Bureau of the Office of the District Attorney and shall thereafter be authorized pursuant to the budgetary and fiscal provisions of the San Francisco Charter. 
(Added by Ord. 156-00, File No. 000858, App. 6/30/2000)
